alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:26AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington and east central Adams Counties through 815 AM MDT... At 726 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Shamrock, or 26 miles south of Fort Morgan, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodlin School, Last Chance and Lindon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Washington County
